resources.string: Since Bisq is a desktop-based application, this app enables you to receive important notifications such as trade updates and offer alerts when you are not near your computer.\n\nThe first step is to pair this app to your Bisq desktop applicationâ€¦

In order to pair this app, you need to scan the above QR code, which contains your pairing token, from your Bisq desktop application using a webcam.\n\nIn Bisq, select Account -> Notifications and press "Scan QR code".

If you are unable to scan the QR code, you can instead send the pairing token to yourself (e.g. via email).

Make sure to keep the pairing token private. It contains your encryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by the Bisq desktop application to encrypt notifications and a token from Google that identifies this device.

Once you have the token, open the Bisq desktop application and go to Account -> Notifications. Then paste/enter the token into the pairing token field. This app will then be paired and take you to the success screen.
Success!\n\nThis app is now paired to your Bisq desktop application.
Unable to retrieve FCM token. Is Google services available and are you connected to the internet?
This will load %1$s. Do you want to proceed?
App has been unpaired as a result of receiving a new FCM token
